reviews.review: Ciekawa Fabuła, Grafika nadal w miarę dobra, Wymagające myślenia poziomy.

¿Qué se puede decir de este magnífico juego que no se haya dicho? La secuela al innovador juego de puzzles de plataformas lanzado con The Orange Box. Básicamente toma todo lo que hizo al Portal original un juego excelente, y expande tanto la jugabilidad como la historia. El elemento clave a nivel jugabilidad que se ha añadido son los geles que, combinados con los portales y las físicas realistas, expanden los tipos de puzzles a resolver exponencialmente.

Además del modo historia y cooperativo de 2 jugadores, Portal 2 incorpora las Cámaras de la Comunidad, que son una serie de cámaras de pruebas creadas por otros jugadores utilizando el editor del juego y/o herramientas externas. Estas cámaras extienden la vida del juego hasta el infinito. 

En los aspectos técnicos, Portal 2 tiene una presentación excelente, tanto en música y efectos de sonidos, como voces (a destacar la voz de Wheatley tanto en español como en inglés), y en especial en el apartado gráfico. Los gráficos se mantienen muy aceptables incluso para estándares actuales. Hay que destacar en especial el aspecto de materiales como vidrio y metal, cuya calidad y realismo permiten sumergirse en la aventura de forma absoluta.

En conclusión, este es un juego que absolutamente todo el mundo debería jugar al menos una vez. Espero que algún día lancen una secuela porque el potencial de Portal es prácticamente infinito.

An essential classic. If you have steam on your computer, you must have this game. 

A gratifying puzzle game with an amazing storyline.
Everyone must try this game at least once.
One of the best games I've ever played, A big upgrade from Portal 1. Best puzzle design that I've ever seen and overal good game design.

I'm extremely late to the party when it comes to Portal 2 which was first released on April 18, 2011. 8 years later  I have finally played this game for the first time and beat the main story and co-op and I have to say this game has alot of heart in it. 

The first Portal was a nice short game which felt immersive but felt like it needed more. Portal 2 is the answer to that "more" from the lovable characters, mysterious and ominous plot to the incredible puzzles that really push the player's critical thinking skills  into one gaming session. The game's atmosphere is also amazing with the addition of memorable music and scenery.

Portal 2 is a must-buy even if anyone is late to the party like myself because the party is always happening in Portal and there will always be cake. 

P.S. Make sure to buy the bundle with the 1st and second game if you haven't played either one. The first game though short is still very important and fun.

It's Portal, it's Valve. This game's a classic and if you haven't tried it out yet, just do it already. I honestly think Portal 2 is Valve's [i] best [/i] game (yes better than Half Life 1 & 2, fight me), and, when you're talking about Valve, that means a [i] lot [/i].

The puzzles in the Portal games are completely original and unique. You will not find anything like this anywhere else. The way this game combines narrative and puzzle-solving is genius and it's something that will stick with you for years. The characters you interact with are iconic, the jokes are bound to make you chuckle, and the puzzles are the perfect balance of difficulty and fun.

Doesn't need to be played after the first game, however, what I can say is that some references to the first game do make the initial start of this game even better (without spoiling anything....).

A série de jogos "Portal" é muito boa pois apresenta, além de ótimas mecânicas e personagens muito bem construídos tal como GLaDOS, uma história muito boa que é bem desenvolvida e "casa" perfeitamente com os puzzles e a portal gun. 
Mesmo sendo um jogo rápido que se passa dentro das instalações da "Aperture Science" após um "crash", ele consegue acrescentar novos personagens, como Wheatley, P-Body e Atlas, e desenvolver ainda mais a história, como as pinturas presentes no começo do jogo, as falas da GLaDOS referente à Carol, os áudios de Cave Johnson, entre vários outras coisas que gameplay trás. 
Portal 2 é um jogo com um dos melhores finais, um dos melhores vilões, fases muito bem construídas, um modo co-op muito divertido, mas tem um defeito terrível...não ter continuação
Um jogo muito bem pensado, além de divertido e com puzzles interessantes.
